structure.unit: ARTICLE XI. COUNTY TRANSIT SYSTEM SALES SURTAX

text.section:
Sec. 29-93. Administration, collection and enforcement.
The Florida Department of Revenue shall administer, collect and enforce the tax levied hereunder pursuant to the procedures specified in Section 212.054(4) Florida Statutes (1988 supp.), as the same may be amended or renumbered from time to time.
